title: India Orders Phone Makers to Pre-Install Sanchar Saathi App to Tackle Telecom Fraud
description: India's telecommunications ministry has reportedly asked major mobile device manufacturers to preload a government-backed cybersecurity app named Sanchar Saathi on all new phones within 90 days.
